publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3662 Angela Constance: Congratulations to Margaret Manson on Election as Captain of the Binny Golf Club—That the Parliament congratulates Margaret Manson on her notable election as Captain of the mixed-membership Binny Golf Club at the Oatridge College course in West Lothian; acknowledges that this represents a great step towards achieving equality for women involved with mixed-membership golf clubs, and hopes that this will encourage more women throughout Scotland to obtain leadership positions in mixed-membership golf clubs. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-3662 Congratulations to Margaret Manson on Election as Captain of the Binny Golf Club (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Robin Harper*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*

S3M-3662 Angela Constance: Congratulations to Margaret Manson on Election as Captain of the Binny Golf Club—That the Parliament congratulates Margaret Manson on her notable election as captain of the mixed-membership Binny Golf Club at the Oatridge College course in West Lothian; acknowledges that this represents a great step towards achieving equality for women involved with mixed-membership golf clubs, and hopes that this will encourage more women throughout Scotland to obtain leadership positions in mixed-membership golf clubs. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Aileen Campbell, Jamie Hepburn, Robin Harper, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3662 Congratulations to Margaret Manson on Election as Captain of the Binny Golf Club (lodged on 10 March 2009) Michael Matheson*, Bob Doris*, Claire Baker*, Bill Wilson*, Christina McKelvie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Maureen Watt*, Elaine Smith*, Rob Gibson*

S3M-3662 Congratulations to Margaret Manson on Election as Captain of the Binny Golf Club (lodged on 10 March 2009) Ian McKee*, Anne McLaughlin*, Tom McCabe*, Tricia Marwick*, David McLetchie*, John Wilson*
